name: Wordlier
description:
Follows the same rules as Wordle.

*   Resets the board and selects a new word

>   (Or 'Enter' on a keyboard) Checks your word; this symbol will turn green when your word meets the word requirements (see Real words and Good faith).

?   Settings. Includes:

Real words   If selected, your word must be a real 5-letter word

Good faith   If selected, your word must be consistent with the information you've received so far.

Color letters   If selected, letters are colored based on available information: green - this letter is definitely right; orange - this letter can't be right; yellow - this letter goes somewhere, maybe here.

Reset words   Wordlier tracks the words you've successfully guessed (reported at the bottom of the settings page). These words are not selected again unless you 'Reset words'.

02/02/22 - Updated to add more results tracking, specifically, storing past words and the number of tries.
